com.comphenix.packetwrapper

Class BlockChangeArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.packetwrapper.BlockChangeArray

  • public class BlockChangeArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for creating arrays of block changes.

    See also Packet34MultiBlockChange.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlockChangeArray.BlockChange
      Represents a single block change.

    • Constructor Summary

      BlockChangeArray(byte[] input)
      Construct a new block change array from the copy of a given data array.

      Construct a new array of block changes.

        Construct a new array of block changes.
        Parameters:
        blockChanges - - the number of blocks that have been changed.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockChange

        public BlockChangeArray.BlockChange getBlockChange(int index)
        Retrieve a view of the block change entry at the given index.

        Any modification to this view will be stored in the block change array itself.

        Parameters:
        index - - index of the block change to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A view of the block change entry.

      • setBlockChange

        public void setBlockChange(int index,
                           BlockChangeArray.BlockChange change)
        Set the block change at the specified index to contain the given block.
        Parameters:
        loc - - the location that will be converted.
        block - - the new content of the block change.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Retrieve the number of block changes.
        Returns:
        The number of block changes.

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Convert this block change array to a byte array.
        Returns:
        The resulting byte array.
